course_title: Special Topics in Jewish Studies: Literary Translation Workshop
class_notes:
(Same as GER 375 2, MESAS 370 4, CPLT 369 2)
Special Topic:  Literary Translation Workshop
By engaging with foundational theoretical approaches and learning from working translators, students will develop skills in the art of literary translation in the supportive setting of a workshop-style course. The final project will include contributing a translation to our class anthology of short stories for children and youth. Knowledge of a language other than English at the 300 level or above required; prior translation experience not required.
sections: Class Nbr: 4282, Section #: 2, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: M 2:30-5:15p, Instructor: Uca/Udel, Status: Open
